message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this unique product with you. I think you'll find it's a game-changer. I'm willing to offer it to you for $850000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm afraid $700000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $750000. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $750000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $680000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but $680000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to compromise further, so I'm counteroffering at $720000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not sure $720000 is the right price for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $690000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but $690000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle again, so I'm counteroffering at $710000. This is my last compromise, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not sure $710000 is the right price for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $680000. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle one last time.

I'm starting to think we're getting a bit stuck, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $700000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can wrap things up.
